mentalWellness.title: Mental Wellness
mentalWellness.description: Learn about understanding your feelings, developing healthy coping strategies, and supporting others. Nurture your mind for a balanced life.
mentalWellness.skillAreaUnderstandingEmotionsDescriptio: Learn to identify and understand your feelings and the feelings of others.
mentalWellness.skillAreaCopingStrategiesDescription: Discover healthy ways to manage stress, anxiety, and difficult emotions.
mentalWellness.skillAreaMindfulnessBasicsDescription: Practice techniques to stay present and calm your mind.
mentalWellness.skillAreaBuildingResilienceDescription: Develop skills to bounce back from challenges and adversity.
mentalWellness.skillAreaEmpathyAndSupportDescription: Learn how to support others and build strong, healthy relationships.

languageLab.title: Language Lab
languageLab.description: Embark on a journey to learn new languages! Interactive lessons, vocabulary building, and grammar practice for languages around the world.
languageLab.skillAreaExploreDescription: Choose a new language to learn or continue your progress.

languageLabView.noLessonLoaded: No lesson loaded. Please select a lesson.
